#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000009
#define MAXN 100005
#define pi 3.14159
#define D 1009
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 

string s;
int lps[100005];

void make_LPS(){
	int len=0;
	int i=1;
	lps[0]=0;
	int l=s.length();
	while(i<l){
		if(s[len]==s[i]){
			len++;
			lps[i]=len;
			i++;
			continue;
		}
		if(len!=0)
		len=lps[len-1];
		else{
		lps[i]=0;
		i++;}
	}
}

int kmp(){
	memset(lps,0,sizeof(lps));
	make_LPS();
	return lps[s.length()-1];
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int cas=1;cas<=t;cas++){
		cin>>s;
		int val=kmp();
		if(!val)
		cout<<"Case "<<cas<<": "<<-1<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"Case "<<cas<<": "<<val<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
